error: `import weak` is not supported in Edition 2024
  --> testdata/parser/import/order.proto:21:8
   |
15 | edition = "2024";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
20 | import "bar.proto";
21 | import weak "weak.proto";
   |        ^^^^
   = help: deprecated since "proto2", removed in Edition 2024
   = help: `import weak` has been replaced with `import option`

error: import after `import option`
  --> testdata/parser/import/order.proto:24:1
   |
23 | import option "bang.proto";
   | --------------------------- previous `import option` here
24 | import "wrong.proto";
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: `import option`s must be the last imports in a file

encountered 2 errors
